about.title: What is the Acne Treatment?
about.description: At The Skin Firm, our Acne Treatment is designed by a dermatologist's protocol that targets acne at its root and not just the surface. Whether you're dealing with active breakouts, hormonal acne, or persistent post-acne marks, this treatment is tailored to your skin's unique condition. Combining clinical-grade technology with medical-grade formulations, our approach reduces inflammation, clears clogged pores, balances oil production, and prevents future flare-ups, all while being gentle on the skin barrier.
about.highlight: Our acne solutions are ideal for everyone, be it teens, adults, or even those with sensitive or acne-prone skin who haven't found success with over-the-counter products.

steps.title: Skin Analysis & Consultation
steps.description: A detailed skin assessment by our in-house dermatologists to understand acne type, severity, and triggers.

steps.title: Deep Pore Cleansing
steps.description: We utilise advanced medical facials, gentle peels, or hydra-technology to eliminate impurities and decongest pores.

steps.title: Targeted Treatment Application
steps.description: Application of anti-inflammatory actives, acne-fighting ingredients like salicylic acid or retinoids, and procedures such as chemical peels, laser therapy, or comedone extraction as per the dermatologist's prescription

steps.title: LED Light or Laser Sessions
steps.description: Cutting-edge technology to reduce bacteria, calm inflammation, and accelerate healing.

steps.title: Customised Aftercare Plan
steps.description: A personalised home regimen with medical-grade products to continue results and prevent relapse.

benefits.title: Benefits of Acne Treatment
benefits.subtitle: Benefits
items: Reduces active acne, whiteheads, blackheads, and cysts
Controls excess sebum and bacteria buildup

Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin
Customizable plans based on the severity of acne

downtime.title: Downtime Information
items: Reactions may vary from minimal, depending on the treatment used.
Some redness, dryness, or mild peeling may occur for 1–3 days, especially after chemical peels or extractions.

postCare.title: Post-Care Information
items: Avoid direct sun exposure and always use a broad-spectrum SPF.
Refrain from picking or exfoliating treated areas.
Follow the prescribed skincare routine, including moisturizers and spot treatments.
Schedule regular follow-ups to enhance results and maintain long-term skin clarity.

questions.question: How soon will I see results from the acne treatment?
questions.answer: Most clients notice visible improvement within 2–4 sessions, depending on acne severity and skin type. For enduring results, maintaining a long-term regimen is essential.

questions.question: Is this treatment effective for all types of acne?
questions.answer: Yes. Our protocol is effective across all acne types, including hormonal, cystic, and adult-onset acne. The treatment is customised after a thorough skin evaluation

questions.question: Can acne-prone, sensitive skin tolerate these procedures?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We carefully select our ingredients and modalities, ensuring they're effective yet non-irritating. Sensitive skin types are treated with additional attention.

questions.question: Will this help with acne scars, too?
questions.answer: While this treatment primarily focuses on active acne, we also provide additional procedures like microneedling or laser resurfacing specifically for acne scars, which can be integrated into your plan.

questions.question: How often should I get the treatment done?
questions.answer: Typically, sessions are spaced 2–4 weeks apart. Your dermatologist will create a schedule based on your skin's needs.
